p: PERMUT was used to estimate h S (within population diversity), h T (total gene diversity), G ST (coefficient of genetic variation over all populations), and N ST (coefficient of genetic variation between haplotypes). Phylogeographical structure is present if N ST is significantly higher than G ST (Pons & Petit, 1996). The relationships among haplotypes were estimated using the median‐joining method (Bandelt, Forster, & Röhl, 1999), implemented in Network version 4.6.1.2.
